languages.text: Each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or kill on an enemy grants the wearer +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. An attack that misses the target resets this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property:+15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Each critical hit or kill of an enemy grants the wielder +5% critical hit chance and +5% critical damage. An attack that misses the target resets this bonus. Base armour property:+15 Strength.
Each critical hit or kill on an enemy grants the wearer +5% critical hit chance and +5% critical damage. An attack that misses the target resets this bonus. Base armour property:+15 Strength.

Each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or kill on an enemy grants the wearer +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. An attack that misses the target resets this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property:+15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

languages.text: Cada {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} crítico o muerte infligido a un enemigo concede al portador +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico y +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g}. Si un ataque falla contra su objetivo, la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} se reinicia. Propiedad básica de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}: +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.
languages.original_text: Each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or kill on an enemy grants the wearer +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. traits.locale_text: Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} crítico o muerte infligido a un enemigo concede al portador +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico y +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}daño crítico{/g}. languages.text: 每当装备者对敌人造成暴击或击杀敌人时，都会获得+5%{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}暴击率{/g}与+5%{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}如果未能命中敌人，加成效果会被重置。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g} 基础{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}特性：+15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。
languages.original_text: Each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or kill on an enemy grants the wearer +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. An attack that misses the target resets this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property:+15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者对敌人造成暴击或击杀敌人时，都会获得+5%{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}暴击率{/g}与+5%{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}暴击伤害{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}如果未能命中敌人，加成效果会被重置。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g} 基础{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}特性：+15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。

languages.text: Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} critique ou chaque élimination d'un ennemi confère à l'utilisateur +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique et +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g}. Toute attaque qui manque la cible réinitialise ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de base :+15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}.
languages.original_text: Each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or kill on an enemy grants the wearer +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. An attack that misses the target resets this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property:+15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique ou chaque élimination d'un ennemi confère à l'utilisateur +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique et +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}dégâts critiques{/g}. Toute attaque qui manque la cible réinitialise ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de base :+15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}.

languages.text: Jeder {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}kritischer Treffer{/g} oder jeder getötete Feind gewährt dem Träger +5 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} und +5 % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Schaden{/g}. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} wird von einem Angriff, der das Ziel verfehlt, zurückgesetzt. Grundeigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}:+15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.
languages.original_text: Each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} or kill on an enemy grants the wearer +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}. An attack that misses the target resets this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property:+15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}kritischer Treffer{/g} oder jeder getötete Feind gewährt dem Träger +5 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} und +5 % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritischen Schaden{/g}. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} wird von einem Angriff, der das Ziel verfehlt, zurückgesetzt. Grundeigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g}:+15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.

languages.text: 敵に対するクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}または殺害の1つ1つで、使用者のクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}ヒット率{/g}に +5%、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}に +5%付与される。ターゲットを外した攻撃は、この{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}をリセットする。 基本{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}特性：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g} +15

An attack that misses the target resets this {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property:+15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

languages.text: Каждое совершенное {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g} или убийство противника дает персонажу +5% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} и +5% критического урона. При промахе {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} обнуляются. Базовое свойство: +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.
